title: SUNNY MOUNTAIN HOME IN STATE PARK
posting_body: 2600 Sq' Sunny Mountain Home, South Facing, on 2.5 Acres, in Golden Gate Canyon State Park 3 Bedrm, 2 Bathrms,
1 Car Attached Garage, Optional Detached Insulated Heated, Electric, Shed, can be used for Office, Art, Hobby, Extra $.
Hiking, Biking, Ski Trails out Back Door.
Nature Lover's Paradise.
Partial Furnished.
Kitchen -  Hickory Cabinets, Granite Tile Counter-top, Knotty Pine Ceiling, Skylites, Tile Floor.
Living Room -  Large Wood Burning Moss Rock Fireplace, Knotty Pine Paneling, Vaulted Ceiling, Skylites, Bay Window.
Insulated Wood Windows.
Hardwood Floors.
Full Downstairs Bathroom, Tile Tub Shower Enclosure.
Closet, Vanity Sink, Toilet.
2 Downstairs Bedrooms.
Knotty Pine, Skylites.
Carpet and Hardwood Floors.
Walk-in-Closet.
Laundry Room, Tenant Supplied Washer/Dryer.
Hang Clothes Outdoors on Large Deck, for Drying, also.
Stairway up to Loft Area, Master Bedroom and Master Bathroom.
Carpet Runner Hardwood Steps and Crafted Handrail.
Loft Area can be used for Office or Reading area.
Can Observe Moon Lit Skies.
Master Bedroom, Kingsize Bed, 2 Dressers.
2 Closets, His and  Her.
Patio Door, Walkout Balcony Overlook, View.
Vaulted Knotty Pine Ceilings, Skylites, Dormers.
Carpet.
Master Bathroom, Jacuzzi Tub, Shower, Marble Finshed.
Skylites.
Drywall Finish.
1 Attached Car Heated Garage with Electric and Water.
Heat for House is Propane Boiler, Infloor Radiant and Baseboard Heat, Ceiling Fans.
Water is 250' Rock Spring Water.
Best Water, no Chemicals, Ultra Lite Filtration System.
Asphalt Parking Area.
Rent is 3000$ Per Month + Utilities + Deposit.
Lease.
Landlord Pays Utilities, Tenant Reimburses Landlord with Amount + Monthly Rent Each Month.
Vehicles, AWD, 4WD, FWD Recommended, for Wintry Day, Night  Driving.
House for Rent Is Large Chalet Portion and Connection to Small Chalet.
Totally Independent, Sound Proof and Fireproof.
Small Chalet is Independent Rental, Independent from House.
Currently Rented to 1 No Pets Person Works Out of Town Majority of Time, and No Guests.
Centrally Located.
15 Minutes to Coal Creek Canyon.
30 Minutes to Arvada, Boulder, Golden.
20 Mins to Blackhawk, Nederland.
